doc.title: Midnight Follies
doc.plot: A compilation of four short science fiction films: 'Peter Billingsley' (qv) and 'Robert Meyer Burnett' (qv)'s _Sacred Fire, The (1994) _ (qv), 'Eric Wallace' (qv)'s _Dark Faith (1991) (V)_ (qv), 'Lazslo Bene' (qv)'s _Public Image (1993)_ (qv), and 'Bud Robertson' (qv)'s _Crystal Ball (1989)_ (qv). No additional material is included save for bumper credits.
